Smart Watering Can: A watering can that uses sensors to monitor the moisture levels in the soil and automatically water plants when needed.
Solar-Powered Watering Can: A watering can that uses solar panels to generate power and water plants.
Self-Watering Watering Can: A watering can that uses a built-in water pump to automatically water plants.
Watering Can with Water-Saving Technology: A watering can that uses water-saving technology such as drip irrigation or low-flow nozzles to water plants.
Watering Can with LED Lights: A watering can that has built-in LED lights to provide additional light for plants.
